bug.title: App crashes after creating account with BYN currency
bug.description:
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour 1. Create an account with BYN currency. 2. Hit Save.
#### Expected behaviour 3. Account created and account list shown
#### Actual behaviour 3. App crashes 4. Any further attempts to start the app cause crashes
#### Software specifications * GnuCash Android version: 2.1.4 * System Android version: 6.0.1 * Device type: All
